description: This file defines API endpoints for monitoring functionalities related to devices and their telemetry data, using FastAPI, including submit and list operations.

methods.name: TelemetryOut submit_telemetry(device_id: int, payload: TelemetryIn, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Handles POST requests to submit telemetry data for a specific device.

methods.name: List[TelemetryOut] list_telemetry( device_id: int, metric: Optional[str] = Query(default=None, description="Filter by metric name"), limit: int = Query(default=100, le=1000, description="Max items"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve telemetry data for a specific device with optional filtering.

ctags.name: list_telemetry
ctags.signature: ( device_id: int, metric: Optional[str] = Query(default=None, description="Filter by metric name"), limit: int = Query(default=100, le=1000, description="Max items"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: submit_telemetry
ctags.pattern: /^def submit_telemetry(device_id: int, payload: TelemetryIn, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: Use/
ctags.signature: (device_id: int, payload: TelemetryIn, db: Session = Depends(get_db), _: User = Depends(get_current_user))
